fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check a player at night. If they would be a criminal or evildoer according to their role lore, such as Post 1252, then you will lynch them, which just attacks them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, the host goes through all the roles and makes a list of what is considered a criminal or evildoer. You do not know this list.
- Your goal is literal, so you must lynch *all* criminals and evildoers in the game. However, you can check dead players.
- You don't need to kill your target, you just need to attack them for it counting.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Lynch all criminals and evildoers. (Not Town Goal)
